discourse_list.title: Makerdao Github Cleanup - Review Core Unit assignments

content.content: Hi all MakerDAO Github Users! As part of the cleanup and classification in the makerdao github I have assigned repositories to the Core Units that seems to work on them/have them in their mandate - and also marked a load of repositories for being archived. Next step is now to review with relevant core units. I will ask @Core-Facilitators to assign somebody on your team to review and comment if needed on the assignment/classification and answer any direct questions in the lists in this spreadsheet:  docs.google.com    20220926 Review- Classification & Cleanup MakerDAO repositories and code... Repos to Archive  Core Unit to ask,Repo Name,Private,Archive?,Class,Notes / Question,CU Answer / Notes,Description,Created_at,Clone URL  ,commdev-grants-transparency-dashboard,Yes, ,20220926 agreed with David Utro to archive,2019-10-02T11:55:07Z,      I am asking you to create a copy of the sheet where you enter the answers and then share that sheet with me ([email protected]) so I know who the answers are from. Please review as soon as possible and no later than October 18, 2022. If I don’t hear anything by then I will assume the assumptions in the list are correct. Here are the links to the individual sheets for Core Units: Starknet Engineering CU  docs.google.com    20220926 Review- Classification & Cleanup MakerDAO repositories and code...
